titles.title: Making appropriations for Department of State, foreign operations, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes.
Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2020

Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2020

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-78, by Mrs. Lowey.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 54.
